title: Multisite Python Crawler Project – November 2018 – doerCity
content: Read the rules of submission carefully below. For successful submission it is important to satisfy all the rules of the project. Upto 10 top submissions will get an opportunity to get interviewed for AI/ML Internship at https://gnani.ai You need to develop a multi site python crawler using scrapy (https://scrapy.org/). Input to your program will be (any) Website. You need to scrap the site  recursively for all the pages/subpages in the site. The program should also be able to scrap indic fonts (like Hindi, Kannada, Tamil etc.). You need to use Python 3 for developing this crawler. The hint to solving this challenge is to familiarise yourself with in the following link Once you do that it should be a very easy thing to solve   This is an individual Challenge. Teams submissions are allowed.  Every submission  will get a from doerCity.  team will shortlist 10 Top contestants for Internship Interview. All the shortlisted contestants will get a from These candidates will have to appear for an Interview at Gnani.ai location.  Gnani.AI (“Gnani”) is an emerging technology focused enterprise software product provider in vertical AI building, optimised Speech Recognition engine and NLP/NLU modules for Various industries such as Banking, Retail, Insurance, Legal , Travel etc. AI based Auto Call Answering: Provide a contextual call answering systems which automatically interacts with the customer and resolves their queries. This helps companies to have 24*7 customer support along with zero wait times improving the overall customer experience and reducing significant costs incurred in customer care. Customer Service Speech Automation: Provides real time speech and text analysis which helps customer service operators with advanced performance indicators of agents , CSAT and customer sentiments to increase the overall efficiency and save significant costs. AI powered voice assistants: Provide voice assistants tuned for specific customer domains. Voice assistants support multiple languages, and accents . ​ Visit Gnani Innovations at

title: About doerCity – doerCity
content: Let's start doing “Every person is a superstar, we just need to find them a RightStage” is founded by set of passionate professionals who aspire to respect and grow world’s Human Capital. We all know the challenges that graduate students experience to get noticed by Industry and Industry’s struggle to find right fresh talent. Having experienced both sides of this coin, doerCity.com was launched to transform the journey of students from students to a professional. It is our core belief that for this transformation to  happen we need to apply what we have learnt into solving real world problems. which means we need to shift gears from just “  In this journey, industries and startups are collaborating with doerCity.com to expose real industry challenges to students so that students can solve them and gain real industry experience even before they graduate.  This platform helps students to get ready for the real tomorrow by attempting to solve real industry challenges while industries and startups get a chance to experience perspectives of Youth on today’s problems and also experiencing and attracting talent across the country.  Knowing is just the start line, doing is when the actual journey begins. doerCity.com team will strive to bring you the real experience and talent to your door step, all that you have to do is, take those first steps to get yourself ready for match fit. Happy Doing! All Rights Reserved | doerCity WordPress Theme
